**About this list**

*Data last refreshed:* 06 May 2025

Bibliographic metadata (title, year, journal, type) comes from [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-7972-7928).

Citation counts are pulled from Google Scholar.
:::

::: pub-table
```{r}
#| echo: false

library(DT)

pubs <- read.csv("publications.csv")

pubs_display <- pubs[, c("Year", "Authors", "Title", "Journal", "Citations")]

pubs_display$Authors <- gsub(
  "S Canavan",
  "<strong>S Canavan</strong>",
  pubs_display$Authors,
  fixed = TRUE
)

datatable(
  pubs_display,
  escape = FALSE,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 15,
    autoWidth = TRUE,
    order = list(list(4, 'desc'))
  ),
  rownames = FALSE
)
```
